contentfulProduct.seoDescription: These leggings have everything needed to be your go-to workout bottoms, without compromising on looks. Perfect for running, low-impact workouts, yoga, travel, or just lounging. Made from recycled materials and featuring 4-way stretch for the perfect fit.
contentfulProduct.title: Ultra-Soft Performance Legging

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

These leggings have everything needed to be your go-to workout bottoms, without compromising on looks. Perfect for low-impact workouts, yoga, travel, or just lounging. Made from recycled materials and featuring 4-way stretch for the perfect fit.
Quick Dry, Moisture Wicking, Anti-microbial, 4-way stretch
Hidden waistband pocket fits a card or a key
Each legging is made from approximately 7 recycled 2 liter water bottles
Recycled yarn is certified by GRS (Global Recycle Standard)
Recycled polyester dramatically lowers its environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials

Dyed without hazardous chemicals in a dyeing mill that meets bluesign速 standards. Bluesign速 helps factories operate more efficiently by reducing overall water, energy, and chemical use while putting safety measures in place to help protect workers from exposure to chemicals.
Factory is WRAP (Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production) certified, an organization trains and audits production facilities to ensure they are operating in a safe, responsible, and ethical way.
Model is 5'10" and wearing a size Small
Machine wash on cold gentle cycle with like colors. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly. Do not iron or dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 84% Recycled Polyester, 16% Spandex
  • Quick Dry, Moisture Wicking, Anti-microbial, 4-way stretch
  • Hidden waistband pocket fits a card or a key
  • Inseam: 25.5"
  • Each legging is made from approximately 7 recycled 2 liter water bottles
  • Recycled yarn is certified by GRS (Global Recycle Standard)
  • Recycled polyester dramatically lowers its environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials
  • Dyed without hazardous chemicals in a dyeing mill that meets bluesign速 standards. Bluesign速 helps factories operate more efficiently by reducing overall water, energy, and chemical use while putting safety measures in place to help protect workers from exposure to chemicals.
  • Factory is WRAP (Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production) certified, an organization trains and audits production facilities to ensure they are operating in a safe, responsible, and ethical way.
  • Origin: Yunfu City, China
  • Model is 5'10" and wearing a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: These leggings have everything needed to be your go-to workout bottoms, without compromising on looks. Perfect for low-impact workouts, yoga, travel, or just lounging. Made from recycled materials and featuring 4-way stretch for the perfect fit.

svgList.entryTitle: Moisture Wicking & Odor Fighting - Flow knit
Better for you & the planet - Flowknit

content.value: We partner with factories who have a commitment to responsible production. This means paying workers fairly and doing their best to produce in a way that reduces damage to the environment.

We're working hard to use sustainably produced materials that minimize our impact on the planet, such as organic cotton, responsiblysourced wool, and finishes that are free of harmful chemicals and toxins.
We believe in creating high quality, functional, and timeless essentials that will be used or worn for a long time, and won't end up in a landfill.

Thanks for your review.
Your comment will soon be 
visible online.

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! Its now a reality  in 10 colors  thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to selldirectto the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like Im Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
